website_summaries.verdict: Some additional strap adjustments may be helpful, but we like this model's overall stability and minimal learning curve.
pros: Very lightweight aluminum construction, minimal muscle fatigue
Appealing price point for professional grade stilts
cons: Support straps awkward to use, can come loose

customer_reviews.title: Why did no one tell me there was SUCH an easy replacement for moving ladders around rooms
customer_reviews.text: Holy Cow! I cannot believe I have not owned these for my entire adult life. Why did no one tell me there was SUCH an easy replacement for moving ladders around rooms!?! I will use these for our home remodeling, which involves a lot of ceiling work, but I will also use them for painting as well as just anything that requires use of a mid-height ladder. They arrived quickly, the learning curve was practically zero. I walked around for a few minutes and went right to work. I keep a ladder set up to place all the tools at the height I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: They are very sturdy and easy to walk in. Great quality build and good price.
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfect for the costume that I used them for. It was for Halloween. They are very sturdy and easy to walk in. Great quality build and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Evolution Masks

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of stilts. They walk a little bow legged. Easy to adjust. For $80 you'll bring them on the job more often than step ladders. Used them almost 2 weeks straight. I'm a big 300lb drywaller.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son to use in a school play. They were easily assembled, easy to fit and use. He learned how to walk in them quickly, and was a bit hit in the school play. I could use them around the house to change ceiling light bulbs, paint, etc, but probably only if my son is wearing them. I don't know if they would hold up to commercial use, but I think they are a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Vet87

customer_reviews.title: and found these to be reasonably priced and had good reviews. The stilts were easy to assemble (not ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a do-it-yourselfer and have never worn stilts before, but I've been doing some drywall work lately and got tired of moving ladders around every time I needed to move. On a whim, I checked the price for stilts, and found these to be reasonably priced and had good reviews. The stilts were easy to assemble (not too much to assemble) and pretty easy to maneuver in, once you get used to them. The toughest part for me was getting on and off of the stilts, but once I figured it out, it was a breeze. These are perfect for what I needed and I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: there are better stilts out there
customer_reviews.text: there are better stilts out there, but for this price they are worth it. They rattle quite a bit while walking. I have tried tightening and lubricating everything and they still make some weird noises. but overall they are worth what I paid. if you have bad or weak knees I would not suggest buying these either. they do put quite a bit of pressure on your joints.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Feel sturdy with me being 230lbs. Definitely a good bang for your buck. I do a lot of drywall work and will update as I use them more. Also, will probably be using these for a Halloween costume because they are easy to walk on. Be sure to take the time to correctly adjust them before you put them to work. Could not give 5 stars due to the arch strap on the right stilt being too short and I had improvise with another strap.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn C.

customer_reviews.title: they are fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: The buckles on these are a little awkward, but they helped me do a full gut-rehab on my place. If you are a full-time professional I would suggest to step up a few price points as all-day comfort just isn't there. But for DIY or part time use, they are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Justin C.

customer_reviews.title: came fast,good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a Halloween costume. As a 118 pound female, it took some practice. Seems like it's made for a man's foot. lol super easy to see stand in, but walking took some practice for me. They were pretty easy to put together. I can always use them for Christmas lights or house work. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: These stilt bars slide when you are on them! Very dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using drywall stilts and stilt walking for over seven years, these are extremely dangerous because they only have support on one side. Because there is only one bar on one side instead of both sides of your feet going all the way up it’s super dangerous and they slide around a lot. Do not recommend. Waste of money and now I have to throw these away before they kill someone. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Roxie k

customer_reviews.title: So cheesy I’m Stilton
customer_reviews.text: I got these used on warehouse. They’re cheap, I wouldn’t buy them for professional use, but I imagine they’re good enough for a few houses.
customer_reviews.author: Jameson K.

customer_reviews.title: useful, affordable, and decent quality - a good purchase if you need them
customer_reviews.text: They take some caution and adjustment, but they are generally of good quality. I've thought about stilts for a long time and am glad I finally made the purchase, they save time on certain types and phases of jobs.
customer_reviews.author: shrimp

customer_reviews.title: Not for pro use in my opinion but decent enough
customer_reviews.text: Decent I wouldn’t use them for professional taping I tried them out as I’ve been using dura stilts all my life they work for less extensive work you do get what You pay for Considering these are less than half of a pair of good dura stilts once again they are decent just not for the run I’d put them through overall a 3 star not exactly the quality I thought ide get not bad for the DIYers to semi pro use
customer_reviews.author: Luis Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: The perfect stilts
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed, be prepared to learn your balance.
customer_reviews.author: Slopopotomus

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: These will get the job done, but your feet will pay the price.. Definitely wear boots. Good for the money. Perfect for the odd job, but not everyday professional use.
customer_reviews.author: Bostonnet

customer_reviews.title: Works great, after a little learning to walking on stilts.
customer_reviews.text: First time user of this type of product. after a slightly difficult product assembly(one screw hole not lining up perfectly) and a little trial and error(almost doing major face plant with floor) i was able to navigate my way and use this product like a Pro. No more constantly moving around Scaffold from place to place.
customer_reviews.author: rlhalsell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am a first time user. It didn't take long for me to get the hang of it. I now use them all the time in my house. It's much easier to strap these on then to run out to the garage to get a latter.
customer_reviews.author: robert sanders

customer_reviews.title: Pentagon Drywall Stilts
customer_reviews.text: They were easy to assemble and comfortable to use. I have never used stilts before so I was a little nervous that I would have trouble walking and maneuvering while mudding drywall. It only took about 10 minutes of walking around to get use to the feel. They make the job of working on the ceiling a lot faster and easier. I wish i would have bought them sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Buskuskie

customer_reviews.title: seem to be having a problem with rivets shearing off ...
customer_reviews.text: seem to be having a problem with rivets shearing off on several pair of these we have. seem to be cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: High up
customer_reviews.text: This is great the only reason I give 3 is because I have flat feet and the foot rest is not wide enough for me and hurts my feet after a few min of wearing them. Otherwise I'd give it a 5
customer_reviews.author: Na

customer_reviews.title: Price is good i had straps got weathered and broke thats my ...
customer_reviews.text: Price is good i had straps got weathered and broke thats my only complaint about these lower priced stiltz but yes if ur a drywaller these are great buy
customer_reviews.author: JOHN DOE

customer_reviews.title: These are great stilts!
customer_reviews.text: Our sons loves to wear stilts and these have worn GREAT for years. We made him a long pair of pants to hide them and he's worn the outfit at various community and church activities to entertain all sorts of crowds. SO FUN!
customer_reviews.author: Val G Collins

customer_reviews.title: Good height for those ceilings that are just out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Works for small projects. Not as ruggedly build as others, but it gets the job done. Good height for those ceilings that are just out of reach versus moving a step stool around or a 5-gallon bucket!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer20

customer_reviews.title: good but could be better with better straps
customer_reviews.text: Like everyone else the straps on the legs suck. I got 2" by 30" I think velcro straps from Lowes. These aren't all that easy to walk on. scarier than I thought they would be when you don't have a wall nearby. You fall and you're sol.
customer_reviews.author: goofyfoot

customer_reviews.title: but they're good. Got them from the Amazon warehouse so it ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while to an align, but they're good. Got them from the Amazon warehouse so it was definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They dont fit
customer_reviews.text: Frankly, they don't fit. Try reaching down your leg with straps that are way too short and difficult to connect... I hate these because I keep trying to make them work thinking I'll try it one more time... BTW I'm 5'10 and 215lbs
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Pre drilled wholes not aligned.  Stinks like gas.
customer_reviews.text: These require assembly and on the ones I received the pre drilled holes did not line up. I had to re drill them out to make them work. They have a terrible off gassing gasoline smell like when you walk into a harbor frieght store. They force you to walk bow legged. Pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: michael p.

customer_reviews.title: They love these. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are the real deal!! Bought them for my workers who already have a pair that aren't adjustable. They love these. Sturdy, well built, and lighter. I highly recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mark gregoli

customer_reviews.title: Things are looking up!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to walk in, made to last!!!! This was a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ken F

customer_reviews.title: They are not even when you put them on. ...
customer_reviews.text: They are not even when you put them on. I kept them because my husband said he can fix them.
customer_reviews.author: Gorda D

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well, has some flaws but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: J. G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Value!
customer_reviews.text: I am a contractor and being efficient is key! These stilts worked flawlessly and eliminated the use of ladders and sped up production ten fold! Great quality, light weight and easy to use! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Came on time
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Came on time. Just too high to be able to walk on. Returned them with no problem. Had to pay shipping costs to return.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Love Them
customer_reviews.text: Worked fantastic. It took a little bit of adjusting as I am bow legged. I compared to some $300 models and didn't see much difference. I spent a month in these as soon as I got them and cut my efforts dramatically.
customer_reviews.author: handyhusband

customer_reviews.title: bought as a gift not for me to get on ...
customer_reviews.text: bought as a gift not for me to get on and break my leg
customer_reviews.author: george A hall

customer_reviews.title: Great tools but not completely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how I ever did ceiling spackle without these. They have sped up my time by at least 40%. They work great, however the leg straps are not extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Adjust them for your weight and lubricate before ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Adjust them for your weight and lubricate before use. Please read the instructions. Very important. Don't be one of those "Hold my beer and watch this" guys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far these have held up perfect and have been used multiple times for all day ...
customer_reviews.text: So far these have held up perfect and have been used multiple times for all day use... great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: military04

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. They are very comfortable and nice to ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. They are very comfortable and nice to walk in. Would recommend buying this product. The only reason I gave them a 4 star instead of a 5 star is that there could be instructions on how to set all the pivot points. But YouTube or has a couple nice videos on how to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Turk

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work well was missing a bolt but no big deal well made came in quickly
customer_reviews.author: jeffery moore

customer_reviews.title: Great product for pro or weekend diyer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these stilts as an addition to my remodeling business. They have sped up my time with mudding drywall tremendously. Just make sure you plan ahead and have everything you need at an elevated height that's easily reachable from the stilts. Especially if you dont have helpers around. Overall I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: the straps were crap and falling apart. The foam rubber on the calf support on the right stilt wasn't attached when it arrived. Very unsatisfied, even though I bought a pair last year and loved them, that's why I purchased another pair, but when I emailed the company they did nothing at all. So next time I will go with different company next time
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Great stilts!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my grim reaper costume! At the lowest level i was 7.5' tall. About 3 hours at a time i used it. Scared the hell out of people! Only thing was the knee strap dug into my leg. I put some foam to help with the comfort there. No problems after that. Little squeaky and clanky but id expect it from metal stilts.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this purchase. Can't walk a block in them without have problems balancing.
customer_reviews.author: theodore a. thompson

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken/ Horrible Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: A mount on one was snapped off and the piece with the bolt was placed in with the bag of bolts. Then the other side had a entire piece forced on and installed backwards. Based on the packaging these issues happened at the factory. Quality control is incredibly poor which is disgraceful considering how hurt someone could get if something failed while using stilts. I needed the stilts for a project and didn't have time to return them. I went through them thoroughly and made repairs where necessary to make sure they would work safely for my one project. I wont use them again in fear of what else the manufacturer skimped on.
customer_reviews.author: rfichtner2

customer_reviews.title: they would be perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a Halloween costume. The feet are very narrow. Granted I didn't get much practice in but, they still felt unstable when standing. If the rubber sole was about an inch to two inches wider, they would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: 1Rare1

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Makes you walk bow legged, hurts at the points were it touches
customer_reviews.author: N and S

customer_reviews.title: A little sacrifice for huge savings
customer_reviews.text: The calf supports are uncomfortable but overall they're a great product, for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Charles Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to strap on and learn to walk on ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to strap on and learn to walk on once you get the hang of them. Straps on the calves give a little when you have them on but I would probably buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and solid
customer_reviews.text: Would suggest getting different calf straps for this as the ones provided are uncomfortable. I'd suggest the padded Velcro straps. Other than that they are great
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Oyen

customer_reviews.title: They're working properly and they are a good weight. I will give 5 Stars if the ...
customer_reviews.text: They're working properly and they are a good weight. I will give 5 Stars if the upper straps are paded like in high end stilts.
customer_reviews.author: Luk

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to walk in and well made. I was skeptical about the straps at first, but they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kevech

customer_reviews.title: Scary
customer_reviews.text: I install ceilings for a living; these are way too flimsy and plastic for me to work on. I wouldn’t even trust them for a one time job like removing popcorn texture. They had to go back.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Hensen

customer_reviews.title: great time saver
customer_reviews.text: Love them will cut my time in half. Never walk on stilts before but it was easy the straps get a little lose after a while but not a big deal
customer_reviews.author: Allen m hurst jr

customer_reviews.title: Good product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, straps around legs a little uncomfortable so found different ones. They are also really squeaking when walking in them but overall they get the job done
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: My workers love these! Changed the way we get work done
customer_reviews.text: My workers love these! Changed the way we get work done! Faster
customer_reviews.author: tony collins

customer_reviews.title: They were really easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: They were really easy to assemble. I didn’t even need the directions. Also I live that extra bolts and an extra thumb screw was provided for the extension screws.
customer_reviews.author: Mo M

customer_reviews.title: Working stilts
customer_reviews.text: The use that I have gotten out of these stilts has already paid for them. They are great to reach high for ceiling work and have been a great tool in tapeing and bedding my home.
customer_reviews.author: James Harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them can't believe I've worked with out them all these years
customer_reviews.author: Michael jones

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for scraping our ceiling. Very sturdy and easy to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Harrison

customer_reviews.title: perfect for what i needed
customer_reviews.text: used all month for halloween. perfect for what i needed. They do need a little WD40 sometimes get kinda squeaky
customer_reviews.author: DirkPitt

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: They are legit. I plaster full time and they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: love them except....
customer_reviews.text: these are great stilts. they don't work at all on the highest setting. you just fall over
customer_reviews.author: orgilldj

customer_reviews.title: Great value stilts for DIY projects
customer_reviews.text: Great value stilts for DIY projects. Not as comfortable as the high end models im sure but I would repurchase these
customer_reviews.author: Travis Bish

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I am slowly remodeling my entire house, room by room and these are great for when I'm hanging my crown moulding, taping, spackling, and sanding. They do take a little bit of time to adjust correctly and get used to wearing, but now I wish I had them a few years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I've had them about 6 weeks and have used them twice.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and some design flaws
customer_reviews.text: Not very stabile- poor fitment. Would rather have Velcro straps- hard to strap in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great...
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good. They do what they are ment to. I taped two ceilings so far and did it half the time
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Stilting at Windmills
customer_reviews.text: My goofy husband had been saying he wanted stilts forever. For what, I have no idea. He's in IT, not construction. In any case, I finally ordered him a pair for his birthday. I didn't want to spend a mint, yet I didn't want him to break a hip on some cheap flimsy stilts. While originally perplexed at the gift, he has since spent quite a lot of time stomping around the house, chasing the children and informing me how dirty the top of the fridge is. He's also planning on using them to hang Xmas lights, change light fixtures, and maybe paint ceilings. All in all, this was a good gift for a silly man.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewToaKill

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for any more
customer_reviews.text: As far as any online purchase can be measured, this product reached 100% of expectations. The price was competitive, they arrived VERY quickly, in perfect condition, the assembly and use instructions were clear and easy to understand, and above all, they work exactly as expected. There is not one complaint I could make.
customer_reviews.author: Jack - Florida

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a couple of taping jobs al
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Cowboys for Life!

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Stilts work great, once you get used to them. They squeak occasionally, but oh well. These worked perfect for the costume I needed them for.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle West

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Never have used them before got use to them quickly. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Hunsinger

customer_reviews.title: Good for drywall, better for dressing in drag!
customer_reviews.text: Since I broke my cankles I have been super unsteady on my leopard print, size 14 stilettos. Now I can keep up with all the other ladies of the night in these stabilizing drywall stilts. I can sashay, rhumba, mash potato and twist in these bad boys without stepping on the hem of my evening gown. And my lip-syncing to ABBA has really gotten that extra oomph I was looking for when my 6' 4" body is propelled to a staggering 7'10". No one upstages Sweet Velour in these bad boys!!!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Green

customer_reviews.title: But other than that they are good stilts
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the straps on the left one was shorter than the ones on the right one? But other than that they are good stilts
customer_reviews.author: garrett

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome.. the straps are fine they changed them ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome..the straps are fine they changed them and they dont come lose. easy to walk ,sturdy , just as good as the $150 pair....definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to walk on, perfect for scaring children.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to walk on. I bought these for a Slenderman Halloween costume but in the months since I have found myself using them to do everything from hang christmas lights to clean fans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: saves time great product for a low price
customer_reviews.text: getting them set up took a few minutes, once i had them on it took all of 20 seconds for me to fall. did a little adjustment and i love them now. after ten minutes of practice it was effortless. ceiling and high work will never be the same for me. i can't believe i waited this long to get a pair.
customer_reviews.author: bruce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we needed. We use them to hang/remove Christmas lights and they are very sturdy and hold up well for different weights.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I have used these stilts now for three drywall jobs mudding ceilings. The only problem I have with them is that the straps around the upper leg constantly come loose. Other than that they can't be beat for the price. I feel pretty stable on them. I would recomend these to anyone who doesn't want to spend an arm and a leg.
customer_reviews.author: Cason

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The stilts are grate the only problem is the straps don't hold vary well we replaced them with belts
customer_reviews.author: ramjr

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We purchased three sets for our business use. For efficient use-Once adjusted for a particular person, it is best to keep it to that user. People set their feet different when they walk. We use them for a lot of overhead work and they are very stable and secure. Follow the instructions and check each nut and screw before each use. We put a small scaffold on wheels beside with materials, etc., and roll it alongside as we work.
customer_reviews.author: Axis Construction Service

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted out of the product! Low weight makes for easy maneuverability and the adjustable legs make it ideal for dry walling
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect just what i needed just wish the leg straps were a little more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: By far the most terrifying tool Ive ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I didn't put them together correctly or what but when you walk on them the feet articulate so much that you end up leaning forward when you walk. I don't know of there is a way to tighten the feet however so I'm not giving up yet.
customer_reviews.author: The K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the money there awesome a little stiff but working great
customer_reviews.author: Mike d

customer_reviews.title: Walking Tall all day
customer_reviews.text: Boom !! excellent product. could not be more satisfied with the transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Such a useful device. I don't use them for drywall at all but really find them handy for work that is higher up.
customer_reviews.author: Easy E

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: They work well, wished I had gotten a set of them long ago, they save alot of time. The only thing that remains to be seen is how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only problem, I should have purchased taller ones The instructions could have been a little better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good price,very usefull.
customer_reviews.text: very fast delivery ,I recomend it ,This is very nice tool and durable. I used this for One month more as every day Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amy K

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got the job done taping sheet rock,then the kids played with them !
customer_reviews.author: Sandrabell

customer_reviews.title: Still learning to use this thing
customer_reviews.text: However it seems well made and sturdy, which is why I gave it four stars. I tried it out a handful of times and it's my first time walking on stilts so I can't compare it to other brands, .Hopefully I'll get more and more accustomed to it. I liken it to a new pair of rollerskates. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Apostle

customer_reviews.title: These are GREAT..
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT....they fit fantastic and stay put....you can do a lot of high work with these on...FYI if you've never used stilts before use a harness and rope to tie yourself up or you'll take a fart knocker and kill yourself....they are NOT too bad to get use to if your balance is NORMAL.
customer_reviews.author: Marty V

customer_reviews.title: Great for finishing drywall
customer_reviews.text: Work great so far. I use them all the way down for an 8 foot ceiling and all the way up for a 9 foot ceiling
customer_reviews.author: Schieltz

customer_reviews.title: Work like a pro
customer_reviews.text: A little cuncky at first, but they made the job a hell of a lot easier. Lots of fun to walk around on the patio in these with a solo cup in hand. Neighbors love them too.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Weiss

customer_reviews.title: works fine
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband to finish streamlining and painting our bathroom. he likes it and it does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Instructions were missing
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, It would have been nice if the required instructions had been sent with the product. I had to get on line to figure out how to properly set them up.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: useless for work
customer_reviews.text: Came with ends off straps. Leave marks on floor, straps come loose when using. Very unstable and loose feeling.

customer_reviews.title: don't fit right
customer_reviews.text: I am average built the stilts they dont fix around my legs.. I am looking for a boney person to sell them to.
